item.title: What is life?
item.description: Living is the process of taking in sight, sound, smell, taste, touch and thoughts from our six senses. It is shown in Dharma as seeing, hearing, feeling and knowing.

item.title: Four Samyak Grants
item.description: There are four practices that should be practiced if one wishes to reach Happiness. In buddhist terms these are known as the four Samyak grants
